title: Teriyaki swordfish with sweet chilli noodles
ingredients: ['550 g (1¼ lb) thick swordfish steaks', '4 small red onions, quartered', '1 large yellow pepper, seeded and cut into 16 cubes', '2 limes, each cut into 8 thick slices', '2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander to garnish', 'For the marinade', '3 tbsp teriyaki marinade', '1 tbsp clear honey', '1 tsp toasted sesame oil', '1 garlic clove, crushed', 'For the sweet chilli noodles', '250 g (8½ oz) fine egg noodles', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '2 garlic cloves, sliced', '1 tbsp finely chopped fresh root ginger', '125 g (4½ oz) mange-tout, sliced', '6 spring onions, shredded', '3 tbsp sweet chilli sauce', '2 tbsp light soy sauce']
